main event: On February 9, 1954, a bright reddish light was observed traveling at high speed, described as heavy, round, and exhibiting flashing movements.
interesting points: The object had no sound and was estimated to be flying at an altitude of 5,000 to 10,000 feet., The object was described as having a red and white appearance., Its speed was estimated at 700 mph during observation., The sighting lasted approximately 2-3 minutes with no landing or takeoff observed., The object was reported to have flashing and changing intensity, indicating potential anomalous behavior.
witness description: The observer noted the object's characteristics and behavior without identifying any specific details about themselves.
